moves.name: Avatar State
moves.description: Aang enters the Avatar State, becoming extremely powerful

moves.name: Tornado Whirl
moves.description: Aang spins a dazzling whirlwind at his opponent

moves.name: Dolphin Spray
moves.description: Aang showers his opponent with a strong burst of water

characters.name: The Boulder
characters.description: super big guy, champion Earthbender, probably a gentle giant

moves.name: Giant Bowling
moves.description: The Boulder becomes a boulder and rolls into his opponent like a giant bowling ball

moves.name: Karate Chop
moves.description: The Boulder karate chops his opponent on the forehead

moves.name: Buns of Rock
moves.description: The Boulder jumps into the air and falls on his opponent, buns first

moves.name: Rock Wall Fall
moves.description: The Boulder creates a tall wall of rock and drops it on his opponents, flattening them

new moves.name: Rock Wall Fall
new moves.description: Aang creates a tall wall of rock and drops it on his opponents, trapping them
